StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UndoCheckoutMaster8412Data]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FileName varchar(250), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @CheckedOutStatusID int DECLARE @CurrentStatus int DECLARE @LogID int DECLARE @UserAssociatedWithFile varchar(15)
--- GET THE STATUS ID FOR CHECKED OUT AND CHECKED IN FILES SELECT @CheckedOutStatusID = MCD_MASTER_DATA_FILE_STATUS_ID FROM MASTER_8412_DATA_FILE_STATUS WHERE FILE_STATUS = 'CHECKED OUT'
--- GET THE CURRENT LOG ID FOR THE SPECIFIED FILE SELECT @LogID = MAX(MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG_ID) FROM MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG WHERE [FILE_NAME] = @FileName
--- GET THE STATUS AND USER LOGIN OF THE SPECIFIED FILE SELECT @CurrentStatus = L.FILE_STATUS_ID, @UserAssociatedWithFile = L.USER_LOGIN FROM MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG L WHERE L.MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG_ID = @LogID
--- IF THE FILE IS CURRENTLY CHECKED OUT BY THE CURRENT USER --- DELETE THE CHECKED OUT ENTRY IN THE LOG TO UNDO THE CHECK OUT IF @CurrentStatus = @CheckedOutStatusID AND @UserAssociatedWithFile = @UserLogin BEGIN DELETE MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG WHERE MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG_ID = @LogID END
